name: Tiny Hero Idle
description:
🌟 Game Introduction: "Tiny Hero Idle"

🔮 A new evolution of the idle RPG!
"Tiny Hero Idle" lets you raise powerful heroes by simply leaving them alone.
It is an idle RPG where you can enjoy rich rewards without having to operate.

⚔️ Immerse yourself in exciting action!
Feel the joy of battle with the cool and colorful action of your growing hero.
Feel free to experience various skills that spread out as you level up.

💎 Continuous challenge with various growth contents!
There are various growth elements in the game such as strengthening, improving skills, upgrading equipment, and creating treasures.
Players can develop their heroes with their own strategies.
You can enjoy the adventures of Tiny Hero.

🎁 Rich rewards to look forward to every day!
We provide players with a variety of rich rewards every day.
Play casually and freely, and strengthen your hero's power.

🖥️ Flexible play style with other games!
"Tiny Hero Idle" runs easily in the corner of your PC screen, and you can enjoy the fun of watching your game character grow idle while you play other games.
Make the most of your gameplay time!


Start your adventure in "Tiny Hero Idle" now!
